com.intelliment.controller

Class CounterController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intelliment.controller.CounterController

  • @RestController
public class CounterController
extends java.lang.Object
    CounterController.java Purpose: Inteliment Screening Test. Implemented RESTful Services, which provide the solution of the tasks, given the sample paragraphs. These Restful services are protected with Spring Security
    Version:
    1.0 7/09/17
    Author:
    Priya
